title: spec: Combined Type switch not working
body:
by **ahirmayur**: 
Combining common results for Type switch on interface is not working.

http://play.golang.org/p/A_9IoAoVVW This works however combining them
http://play.golang.org/p/PNW9i2m1ic seems to be giving a panic

prog.go:30: cannot convert i (type interface {}) to type float64: need type assertion
 [process exited with non-zero status]

Run "go version" and compare against
http://golang.org/doc/devel/release.html  If a newer version of Go exists,
install it and retry what you did to reproduce the problem.

Thanks.

What does 'go version' print?
go version go1.3 linux/amd64
